name: Away (itch)
description:
Your mom is away, where is she ? Protected by hundredds of guards locked in a cage far from a city in Japan....

Fight through those guards with your bare fists anf legs put on the ground, throw BEER bottles at them, just remember all you need to do is save your mother...

Fight through to hord or try not to be seen by cameras and guards. All you need to do is save your mom....
